application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
Tree Number - T1
Tree Type - Walnut (Juglans regia)
Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.3-0.5m
Approx. Height - 8m
Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 6m
Location - Front garden, opposite front door to property
Service - pollard
Work Required - Pollard height down to approximately 1m below previous points to around
4m retaining the lower growth below but shaping accordingly
Reason - as per clients wishes
Priority Code - on
£250.00
Tree Number - T2
Tree Type - Apple (malus spp)
Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.1-0.3m
Approx. Height - 6m
Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 5m
Location - Front garden near to property right hand side
Service - Crown Reduction
Work Required - Crown reduce by removing between 0.5-1m from the height and from the
sides, remove internal water shoots
Reason - as per clients wishes to control and contain overall size of tree
Priority Code - on
£250.00
Tree Number - T3
Tree Type - Sycamore (Acer psuedoplatanus)
Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.3-0.5m
Approx. Height - 15m
Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 9m
Location - Front garden left hand boundary
Service - Section dismantle and treat
Work Required - Section dismantle tree to near ground level and leave stump in the ground,
Treat stump with one application of glyphosate (eco-plugs) only to best endeavour the
prevention of regrowth.
Reason - as per clients wishes, tree close to boundary way and has potential to cause
damage
Priority Code - on
Tree Number - G1
Tree Type - x12 Lime (Tilia cordata)
Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.3-0.5m
Approx. Height - 5m
Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 2m
Location - Front garden Front boundary
Service - Repollard
Work Required - Re-pollard back to previous pruning points at around 3m, to include
removal of all epicormic and basal growth
Reason - as part of continued maintenance
Tree Number - T6
Tree Type - Apple (malus spp)
Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.1-0.3m
Approx. Height - 6m
Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 5m
Location - Front garden near to property right hand side
Service - Crown Reduction
Work Required - Crown reduce by removing between 0.5-1m from the height and from the
sides, remove internal water shoots
Reason - as per clients wishes to control and contain overall size of tree
Priority Code - on
